history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: proj1,locCn. qsimpl time: 1 use: proj1,locCn.

exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d n : nat_eqType H : n \\in nodes l : dynamic id Hfind : find log (getLocal n d) = Some l The term "n" has type "Equality.sort nat_eqType" while it is expected to have type "TPCCoh ?d".

exceptions.tactic: move: (locCn n d C H) => [Hval | [Hcase | Hnotin]].
exceptions.exn: In environment cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts Puniq : uniq pts d : dstatelet C : TPCCoh d n : nat_eqType H : n \\in nodes l : dynamic id Hfind : find log (getLocal n d) = Some l Hvalid : valid (getLocal n d) The term "n" has type "Equality.sort nat_eqType" while it is expected to have type "TPCCoh ?d".

original: intros Hfind. assert (Hvalid: valid (getLocal n d)). apply (proj1 (locCn n d C H)). move: (locCn n d C H) => [Hval | [Hcase | Hnotin]]. - contradict Hnotin. exact: Hfind. - subst. move: Hfind => [s [l' Hlocal]]. injection Hlocal as <-. auto.
